ejemplos:
And I want swift key to save the words I type.
Also another good one is being able to make the space bar bigger by removing the smiley key on the bottom right making the keyboard bigger.
Does not work with S-Pen on Galaxy Note 2

I think it could do with a bit more customization...
It WAS awesome until the layout was changed.
Bring smaller space bar back!

And a few more settings for example, after I insert specific types of punctuation it sometimes put a space after..It would be good to be able to turn that off.
I really would like to see Chinese language integration to be developed.
Very annoying to switch with other input methods.
